scripts.test:chrome: mkdirp report && tsc --outDir build && cross-env NIGHTWATCH_ENV=chrome cucumber-js -p default
scripts.test:firefox: mkdirp report && tsc --outDir build && cross-env NIGHTWATCH_ENV=firefox cucumber-js -p default
scripts.test:chrome:parallel: mkdirp report && tsc --outDir build && cross-env NIGHTWATCH_ENV=chrome cucumber-js -p parallel && node index.js
scripts.test:firefox:parallel: mkdirp report && tsc --outDir build && cross-env NIGHTWATCH_ENV=firefox cucumber-js -p parallel && node index.js
